content: What musical instrument did Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart famously play and compose for at an early age?

Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart was a child prodigy who began playing the piano at the age of three and composing music at the age of five. He is considered one of the greatest composers in history, and his works span a variety of genres, including symphonies, operas, chamber music, and choral music. Mozart's music is known for its beauty, complexity, and emotional depth, and it continues to be celebrated and performed around the world today.
